operations.reasoning: Kumail explicitly said he'd look into why unrelated issues (e.g., 'create intercom connector') appear on the Exponent board today; Karen committed to checking logs. Searched Linear with queries 'intercom connector' and 'board routing' and found no matches, so creating a new issue is appropriate.

createData.title: Investigate Exponent board routing bug showing unrelated issues
createData.description:
Investigate why unrelated issues are appearing on the Exponent board (e.g., 'create intercom connector' unexpectedly on Exponent mirror).

- Verify routing/search scoping to the selected team only
- Karen: review logs to trace how the issue was added to the board
- Reproduce in staging if possible and identify faulty filters/rules
- Add diagnostics to make future occurrences easier to debug

operations.reasoning: Karen stated: 'We should have the slack bot report what's extracted from every recording' and Phillip/Kumail agreed. This extends the existing 'Re-enable Slack notifications' issue from Dec 1 to add recording extraction summaries. Updating rather than creating duplicate.

updateData.description:
Restore Slack channel(s) that log artifacts and their resulting Linear ticket creations/updates for monitoring.

- Reconnect or reconfigure notification pipeline (lost during porting)
- Include meeting, Slack, and GitHub artifact events
- Ensure links to artifact and Linear issue are included
- Validate on Project Exponent and Grapevine workspaces

**Update (Dec 2 standup):**
- Post a summary of what was extracted from every recording to aid debugging
- Choose target channel(s) and message format (include Linear links)
- Ensure idempotency (avoid duplicate posts for re-runs)
- Include error details when extraction fails

operations.reasoning: Karen: 'when you update something to in review or merge, it should just link the GitHub issue' and team agreed. Searched Linear for 'github link' and 'link pr' with no matches; creating a new task.

createData.title: Auto-link GitHub PRs to Linear tickets on state changes
createData.description:
When a Linear issue transitions to In Review or is Merged, automatically link the corresponding GitHub PR to the Linear issue for context.

- Add linking in the Linear operation that handles state updates
- Include PR URL in the Linear issue (description/comment/attachment)
- Optionally post a Slack update on the ticket with PR link
- Ensure behavior is scoped to relevant teams/projects only

operations.reasoning: Team decided to port the human-friendly task quality prompt from triage bot to ambient extraction via a separate async job. Kumail volunteered to create a basic version and hand it off to Johnny tomorrow. Searches for 'ambient prompt' and 'triage prompt' returned no results; creating a new issue.

createData.title: Create async enrichment job for ambient extraction using triage prompt
createData.description:
Build a separate async job to enrich extracted tasks with more human-friendly details using the triage bot's quality prompt, keeping initial extraction fast.

- Keep extraction path fast; run enrichment asynchronously post-extraction
- Consider Aspasia-fast; target ~20–30s runtime budget
- Kumail: set up initial stub; Johnny: take over and tune starting tomorrow
- Avoid blocking demo flow; ensure graceful fallback if enrichment fails

operations.reasoning: Kumail and Karen agreed that administrative tasks are still slipping through; Karen said 'we can definitely tune that more... we can remove that.' No existing issue found with searches 'prompt administrative' and 'administrative tasks', so creating a new task.

createData.title: Refine prompts to avoid administrative tasks in ambient extraction
createData.description:
Reduce/avoid extraction of purely administrative tasks in ambient extraction.

- Tune prompt language to explicitly exclude admin-only tasks
- Incorporate the two Slack examples from today's standup as negative cases
- Re-test on connectors channel examples that previously slipped through
- Add eval cases to ensure this doesn't regress over time

linearState.title: Create fake datasets and end-to-end evals for Slack and meeting transcripts
linearState.description:
Build datasets and E2E evals to measure ambient extraction quality for Slack and meetings.

- Port prior evals from older codebase where useful; fix gaps for current corporate context
- Meetings are hardest; prioritize accurate, high-coverage cases
- Enable quick feedback loops; aim for internal readiness this week
- Coordinate with Karen (quality owner) while Kumail is traveling Wed–Fri

linearState.title: Investigate and fix Grapevine QA stand-up extraction failure
linearState.description:
Debug why Grapevine QA stand-up artifact failed to extract properly.

- Identify root cause of extraction failure
- Fix the bug and verify extraction works
- Add monitoring or tests to prevent recurrence

linearState.title: Separate Ask-Agent code from main eval loop to keep tests fast
linearState.description:
Refactor evals so Ask-Agent usage runs in a separate path to avoid slowing the core eval loop.

- Maintain existing fast, tool-call-only eval loop
- Introduce a separate module/workflow for slow Ask-Agent-based experiments
- Provide simple toggles/config to run either path
- Add tests to prevent regressions in eval run times

linearState.title: Add experimental code/tests for ticket-quality experiments without slowing core evals
linearState.description:
Build experimental harness to test what makes a 'good' engineering ticket for coding agents.

- Add experimental code and tests for ticket-quality experiments
- Keep separate from core eval loop to avoid slowing it down
- Test different ticket formats with coding agents to measure success rate

linearState.title: Implement Notion document processor and integrate into extraction pipeline
linearState.description:
Add Notion doc artifact support: processor + prompt + pipeline integration.

- Create Notion document processor and prompting strategy
- Integrate into ambient extraction routing alongside Slack/Meetings/GitHub
- Add eval coverage for Notion docs; future work may pair docs with meeting transcripts
- Provide minimal scaffolding with room for iteration

linearState.title: Resolve ingestion race by combining Grapevine search with Linear API to avoid duplicate tickets
linearState.description:
Mitigate duplication during ambient extraction caused by ingestion lag.

- When searching for existing tickets, also query Linear API (not just Grapevine DB)
- Evaluate/augment existing 'top 20 most recent tickets' heuristic
- Target rapid Slack thread messages creating multiple duplicates
- Add tests and monitoring to validate reduction in duplicates

linearState.title: Build quick UI/shortcut to log live artifacts as eval datapoints (needs decision)
linearState.description:
Provide an easy way to convert a live artifact (Slack message, meeting, PR) into an eval datapoint.

- Single-click or shortcut from artifact to create eval record
- Capture current Linear board state and link expected outputs; ground truth may still need manual label
- Goal: speed up coverage of real-world issues for future regressions
- Status: undecided/proposed; confirm priority and owner before implementation
